values:
I was going to post this on my tumblr due to the fact that it's my main source of blogging but I'm afraid that's too public. We've been talking nonstop since you left despite the fact that you told me whatever it was that we had was over.
I was used to the idea of that but it's beginning to become a problem. Everyday with the cute goodbyes and amazing compliments. And I was starting to get worried for me to see you in december. And then you sent me this, and I didn't have time to respond before you went to the sleep.

i haven't been with anyone since the summer, and i have had several chances (however pathetic they were) I didn't think letting it end would be a problem. When i asked you if you missed the summer, i meant did you miss us.

I miss us, I miss us so much it kills me.
Please tell me something good tomorrow morning.
I miss you, you make me so happy. I would give anything for us to be together.

Never once in my life has someone been so good to me.
Thank you, even if this is brief.

I spent four hours with you.
I haven't felt that much passion in a long time
I woke up with your arms around me.
You've kissed every inch of me.
You asked if you were allowed to call me
If this was just a one night thing.

The next morning I slept in your bed while you showered.
My skin covered in the smell of you, cigarettes, alcohol and sweat.
It felt right, the harmless kissing 
We walked down the stairs to you car
and you grabbed my hand and smiled.

The ride to work was rushed,
you scolded me in the car.
'You'll be late to work' you say.
I wasn't allowed to tease you anymore.

Before I left the car you kissed me softly
I smiled. 


You kissed my arm.
You kissed my neck.
You kissed my lips.
You kissed my stomach.
You kissed my legs.
You kissed my everything.

But I know you won't call.

my uterus feels like it's gonna fall off.
but considering the fact I was really late and we thought the condom broke
i'm not going to complain.

WHAT THE FUCK.

i am livid.

you know how smells can remind you of something?
I just found my lotion I used all the time in the summer.
I love love love that lotion.
So I put it on.
and holy shit.
i feel like i'm in wellfleet.
sitting on the computer in that side apartment of yours.
just that one memory of playing auto tune the news over and over and over again.
it's very odd.

but it's somewhat pleasant.

today is beckys birthday.
you are going to fondue again.
last year she made it. i was there.
this year you're going out. jessie is gonna be there.

it's so hilarious that you are dating a girl who lives down the street from me.
but i'm also really glad that you felt like you could talk to me about it.
we are FINALLy back to the place we were before.
and I like it so much better.

I'm seriously thinking about getting a tattoo.

also, applied to three more art schools. 
just in case.

i didnt get into massart.

i'm so fucked for next year.

i'm not going to into anywhere,

i don't even know why i thought i could go anywhere with my art.

i  fucking suck.

I read her tumblr today.
And I can see that you are doing exactly what you did to me, to her.
I want to warn her, But i don't like her.
She's from the same town as me, And I wonder if that ever bugs you.
I just hope you don't feel anything for her,
But i'm afraid you do.
Even though you told me you didn't.

Today I found a letter I wrote.
It said:

Hi Pete,
I like it when you throw woodchips at my window.
I'm sorry I'm dwelling.
I love you
-Kimi

That was from the summer when he slept over one night. He was throwing woodchips at my windows and smoking a cigarette and asked me to write a note to him and throw it out the window.
That was when I read a text message conversation with him and margaret
saying that he missed her sometimes. He never knew I read it.
I probably should have let go then.

I threw it out, and didn't feel any heart retching feeling.
Maybe 'cuz it's not him I miss.
But I really do miss having someone around for me.

how much more pathetic can this lj entry get.

I'm so ready to get out of this town, you don't even know.

I went to massart yesterday.
I am in love. It's scary.
Artist's Residence was too hospital like for me.
but Smith Hall was such a community, and everyone was so nice, and ah.
I like it there, a lot.
I like that they leave their doors open.
And I like that everyone knows everyone.
It's the college experience I wanted at Hartford but never got.
If I don't get in, I'm going to be so upset.
You don't even know.


SUBJECT CHANGE.
Taking the commuter rail for the first time since summer was very hard for me.
I was surprised at how hard it was for me.
There was a point in time where I thought about you every minute, then every hour, then every week, then once a month, then once every couple of months.
It's been a while since I missed you, but I don't think I actually missed you, I just missed having someone.
I'm really glad we are friends.

there is not much to really say,
but drunk kimi is bad.

so bad.
I need to lose 15 pounds, STAT.

for four fortnights i had fled from my fortress, foraging forests five footsteps in length.
fortitude found within forty ounce bottles flowing like flies from your face.


And then we were teenagers, we were smoking and fucking.<br type="_moz" />

I never wrote an entry about new york,
but i think its best that way.
there were things that made it harder
and things that made it easier.

2 weeks from friday i'll be home.
3 weeks from friday i'll be in new york once again.

he said he would come and visit me soon too.
our friendship is coming back to life, the trust is slowly (very slowly) coming back
and things are looking up.

Thuy is now officially made it into one of my best friends, along with james.
i have a solid group of people, and more are adding on.
things are better. i'm happy, and i don't get homesick very often.
at times i miss the way things were last year and the unbelievable happiness i felt in the summer
but i wont be getting that back, so i just have to look back longingly and try not to forget such pleasant memories.
I miss the blissfulness and carefree feeling i felt this summer
i miss mel's porch and monicas car, and carls van, and the free shit outside peters house.
i miss the train, and going to porter, and cuddling and sleepovers with pete.
i miss coming home to a house full of life and the full family together.
i miss being that beautiful and happy person i was.
i've never felt more complete than i did that summer.
and i didn't realize it at the time.

I feel as if something is missing now, and hopefully i'll be able to find it.
I don't doubt that I will, but the thought of not having it - whatever it may be, is slowly eating me away.

I think for the most part i'm terrified about myself. remember those swollen lymphnodes?
the swelling hasnt gone down.
it's almost been a year. I'm supposed to go back and see what the doctor says 
I try not to worry about it, but every so often i think about it, and can't stop
and my brain gets worried and anxious.

i don't know, i'm just tired.

I'm going home this weekend, and the following weekend I will be going to new york.
I know it's not a good idea but whatever. He continues to bug me about seeing him, and I want to.
Of course the first thing i will do is slap him across the face, but that's understandable.
The situation we are in at the point in time is weird, especially judging by the way he is acting.
I'm going to try not to overanalyze the situation, but knowing me? I probably will.
shit's been ridiculous. college is nice. but i'm excited to be home this weekend.
things have gotten a little hectic for me and i miss my puppies & my kitties and my mommy and my daddy
AND I WONT GET TO SEE DADDY CUZ HE WILL BE ON A BUSINESS TRIP.
NOT FAIR.

hmph.

so i guess the next time i update this diddy will be when i inform you about new york.
assuming i still go.

bah.

goodnews:
Thuy & James are my favourites.

i had a really wonderful day today.
that boy makes me smile.

and, what? it's august already?

HI IVE BEEN GONE FOR A WEEK AND I FEEL LIKE I SHOULD UPDATE YOU ON MY LIFE.
YES MAJASCULES ARE NECESSARY.

For those of you that were not aware i was in cape cod with shannon this past week.
we did an abundance of things, like swimming and bike riding and puzzling and other normal summer house esque activities.
and then we did the awesome things.

We met up with Pete in Wellfleet a bunch of times and it was really nice because not seeing him for long periods of time is hard on me.
While with pete I went to my first water park, I went to my first drive in movie, i had my first choco taco and oatmeal cookie whoopie pie and I went on my first motorbike ride. We tend to do things i've never done before together, it's really nice.
We also had sleepovers and took a hot tub together - jacuzzi (:

Then there was that one night with margarita's , too much wine, lots of tequila shots, getting taught the 'proper' way to take tequila shots, going swimming in our undies, and being sloptarded with adults. 
Sometimes being drunk with parents is just more fun. hahahah

this week was fun. and i hope the rest of my summer is just as good (:

now my family is hosting a wine tasting - ballin'

KBYE

there's a reason most of my entries are private.

friends only from here on out.

(add me.)

my mom has been bugging me for the past month to talk to my dad about putting down my deposit for hartford.
so today i did,

"the only way we can pay for your college is if we sell the house"

now when i got my letter back from hartford they said i could still fill out FAFSA,
which i havent been able to do because my dad hadn't finished the income taxes.
he just did.
our accountant lost them.

fafsa was the only way i might have been able to even think about going to college.

happy fucking easter.

you make me merry, make me very very happy
but you obviously didn't want to stick around.

I HATE HOW MY BRAIN WORKS.

end of discussion.

but srsly, this sucks.

thank you for being that one person who knew how much i hated it when people visited me at work, and how anxious i really got.
thank you for understanding me, and knowing my boundaries.
thank you for listening to me when i freak out, 
thank you for being there for me.
thank you for being nothing like me, but exactly like me at the same time.
mostly, thank you for being my best friend.
I don't think i've ever met anyone who understands me like you do.
& i don't think i've ever thanked you enough.
i love you [:

p.s if you don't know this is about you, then i'm going to have to take your chocolate mocha cake away from you.
& never share moose with you ever again xP <3
my lips taste like tabasco sauce & it's lovely.

FUCK YOU
FUCK YOU VERY VERY MUCH.

[: <3

i love lily allen, i love my friends, i love my life.
& i don't care about anything at all.

and i feel fine.

CUZ YOUR WORDS DONT TRANSLATE
AND ITS GETTING QUITE LATE
SO PLEASE DON'T STAY IN TOUCH.

everyone has their nervous habits.

i fold things.
like at dinner, i'll fold a napkin. over and over again until it's perfect.
then i'll look around for something else to fold.
gum wrappers, pieces of paper, even empty bags of chips.

people gen,,,
and thats where shannons computer over heated and died
then kimi left so shannon is posting this for her ^_^

this is absolutely not okay & wonderful at the same time.
and i'm still not sure how i'm going to deal with it.
but i think i'll just flow with it. for once.

let's just see what happens.

p.s this is what i do with my free time

i'm a dork. bahaha. srsly

.

i  just left the drivers ed people the most hateful message ever.

"Hi there, i just spent twenty minutes waiting outside of the acton boxborough regional highschool because no one decided to tell me that my driving was cancelled. I scheduled this driving in october, for today, december 31st. And now that it's cancelled by the time i can reshedule it, it will be in the middle of february. I'd rather not have my driving in the middle of february, cuz that's when i got my permit in the first place. I apologize for this hateful message, but this is the SECOND time this has happened to me. "

^ and the tone of voice was just so evil.
there was more to it., but i don't remember.
it was so nice to get that off my chest. actually, even something off my chest.

i'm an asshole, but i don't care.

J.Drama had a stocking & presents, and brought my brother a present,
& still has some under the tree.
Though mine hasn't come in the mail yet.
so funny that he is practically family.

I got a flip video camera, epic win.
& a a tim hortons mug <3 :]
& some canadian chocolates,
& some clothing.

Today was nice.
Tommorow should be nicer,
Saturday should be epic


xo.

i woke up this morning to the sound of what i thought was my father breaking down the walls in my room.
it was nothing like that at all, he was just taking the carpet out of the hall.
i must of been have some weird & twisted dream, because they really don't sound anything alike.

i COMPLETELY forgot about ' how to lose friends and alienate people'
when we talked about it it was early summer, & october seemed so far away.
so we were going to go see that together - but i don't know if that will ever happen.
i'mgoingtoremindyouanywaythough :]

& also, hug bombarding was epic today

smiles.

twitter is like crack,
but my uncle found me on it - and i have no idea how 'cuz the link isn't posted anywhere.
so that freaks me out a little bit.
plus he is only following me, so i think he got it 'cuz i have it
and that is scary. in a way. 'cuz we aren't really close.

other news:
- thanksgiving was nice, turkey made me tired. family time was lovely
- we got our christmas tree today. & it hailed.
- winter is coming i guess
- johnny drama was here for a while, which was nice 'cuz we haven't hung out in a while
- stuff between us is still weird, but i doubt it will ever be normal.
- i have work tommorow, which sucks & a parade on sunday.
- this vacation is over for me, and i haven't done anything.

i CANNOT wait 'till christmas break.
goooodday.

xk.

grey's anatomy was weird tonight. exceptionally weird.

life is nice.
twitter is like crack.
the pierces are creepy in a beautiful way.
my brain hurts a little less.
last night was scary - thank you for being there.
heating works once agian,
so no more freezing.
'two can keep a secret if one of them is dead.'

right-o.
goodday.

i missed 11:11 on 11/11.
that's kind of a disappointment, but sort of symbolic - in a weird twisted way.

your hugs are my absolute favorite :]
thanks

i am flipcup champion.
no fucking lies.

team awesome wins everytime :]

sbu weekend overview:
last dr.hahn episode ever ]:. fucking abc.
graffiti mixer, not a fan of the theta pi's. very clique-y,
i luff me my suny colorguard girlies.
frosties & french fries.
team awesome.
kiwi, golden b, azn, 1 , 5 (aka erica), berryshake
BRREKERANSHON.
epic win.

life is nice.

NO ON 1, YES ON 2

OBAMA FOR PRESIDENT.

<33333333333333333

Congratulations on being the creator of a new

Evil Plan (tm)!

 

Your objective is simple: World Domination.

 

Your motive is a little bit more complex: Sadistic pleasure

 

Stage One

To begin your plan, you must first seduce a pope. This will cause the world to slaughter a sacred calf to appease the gods, paralyzed by your arrival. Who is this nightmare beyond comprehension? Where did they come from? And why do they look so good as a brain in a jar?

 

Stage Two

Next, you must vaporize the internet. This will all be done from a amusement park, a mysterious place of unrivaled dark glory. Upon seeing this, the world will spontaneously combust, as countless hordes of winged monkeys hasten to do your every bidding.

 

Stage Three

Finally, you must tauntingly wave your needlessly big weather machine, bringing about an end to sanity. Your name shall become synonymous with the spice girls, and no man will ever again dare make you clean your room. Everyone will bow before your mind-boggling insanity, and the world will have no choice but to lavish endless praise on your misdeeds.

panic attacks are not something i enjoy.
so i sat in the middle of the street and tried to calm down.
thanks for listening to my panic.

i hate this.

i'm about to go to work.
i really don't want to. i want to sit and think about everything.
i made a bad choice last night, i don't know if i should tell anyone 'cuz i know they will just be disappointed in me.
the cycle i finally got out of , i'm getting back into. i'm not sure how to deal with it.
because it makes me happy, it makes me, me. it's not smart.
i know every single one of my friends will hate me if i told them.

other news.
i really hope it's really her.
i miss her.

time to organize placemats and table cloths for 5 1/2 hours.
bye?

soooo sick.

need sleep.
baaaaahhh why is life confusing?
